content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving work on february 27th and going on the 94 w towards downtown. right as i turned on the freeway i saw three lights glowing in the sky. you could not miss it, the sky was very clear that night. the lights were white with yellow around it. they were as bright as headlights in the sky. i knew right away it was not a plane. the height was airplane level (or at least level to airplanes about to land by downtown. i thought at first it was a firework but i didn't see any more right after it and they were moving too slow to be a firework.  i thought maybe it was a shooting star, but there were three. maybe a meteor broke up into three pieces? it was moving too slow for a shooting star also. then they got brighter and dissappeared. they dissappeared just as a shooting star or firework would dissappear. i knew it wasn't a plane for sure, i saw a plane right next to it and it was giving off nowhere near the intensity of illumination as what i saw. there was also no clouds or fog to disappear into.I thought it was strange but didn't really think anything of it. 
then about 10 seconds later i saw the three lights appear again but in a different location, it was more to the left of my view and in the same triangular positioning. when i saw this i knew 100% that it was not a firework or shooting star. it did not come from the ground up like a firework and it was not falling from the sky down. it was already there and lighted itself up. i was completely mesmerized. the three lights got brighter and then dimmed and then got brighter again before they dissappeared. once they disappeared i thought to myself,why i didn't take a picture. i was so confused and focused on these unkonown objects that i missed my 5 n freeway also. at this time, i am in downtown and i saw one more ufo, much lower than the three that just dissappeared.  i figured that there were four but this one was blocked by buildings earlier. i grabbed my camera phone and took a picture. i realized that there are so many lights in downtown it probably wouldn't turn out. i took it anyway and when i zoomed in the picture i saw 4 objects, not just one. i was really tripped out, i still am, because the three had already disappeared but yet they are captured in my picture in the same location and positions where they were before they disappeared. after reading other reports, i noticed the times and some sighting were an hour later. i wonder if these ufo's are invisible and flash their lights once in a while. maybe they are here more often than we think???
content.summary: 3 lights disappear and 4 reappear 10 seconds later a little to the left

content.detailedDescription:
For two years i have been filming orbs in my area with a samsung camcorder.  i filmed mostly down my street at a culdesac.  when i was about done filming, collecting 8 hours of footage, i was filming an orb in the east.  when i turned around i was confronted with a big bright, white and round light.  it was about 8 feet in diameter, as it hovered.  when i first saw it i said, "what the hell is that?" then i lifted the camera, and started filming it.  then a telepathic presence came over me on me, except down the middle of my back.  then while filming i became aware somehow of three greys in the object.  one was a doctor, and the other two were workers.  they were viewing me in a small monitor.  the doctor alien said, "what is he doing?" then the object retracted further out, until it looked like a dot of white light.  it stopped at about 45& from the horizon, hovered for a couple of seconds then moved on northward.  the telepathic presence on me quickly subsided.

my film shows the object having a round metalic bottom, and at first looking like an upside down umbrella without a handle.  

i was very excited to experience this, and i surprisingly did not shake very much while filming.  thank you.
content.summary: I turned around and there it was 30 yards away from me.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was walking down my street sidewalk i saw in the south a very small dotted object (1/16" in diameter)intimidate a small aircraft (privately owned airplane).  i saw the object traveling at the exact speed as the plane at 11 o'clock (position) then go to its cockpit then back and forth to its back wings.  then a big pine tree got in way of my view.

two or three weeks later i saw it again in the same place at 11 o'clock, and doing the same as above.  only this time i saw it from my living room window.

six months later, i was walking down my street sidewalk, and i looked to my right.  it was about 75 yards from me, and traveling at the exact speed i was walking.  about twenty seconds later it flung out towards me, and disappeared into outer space at a high speed.  i was not wearing glasses, as that might have created light reflection.  

the object was about 75 yards from me in all three cases.  thank you.
content.summary: I saw twice a very small object intimidate a small plane.

content.detailedDescription: These craft are readily apparent in the skies above.Take out a telescope,there are goldish craft right outside our atmosphere.Prepare yourselves,how i dont know yet.Will keep you posted while i survey them and surmise their habitual patterns,timelines;and intelligence on them.Keep you posted.Thanks!
content.summary: There here!Craft continuously hovering and monitoring us.Becoming a regular phenomenon

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our car driving home from my work. while traveling north on i-29 i noticed an object on the nebraska side of the missouri river flying to the west at what seemed to be a very low velocity, and at low altitude. i first thought it was an airplane. there is a small civilian airport/air national guard base about 5 miles to the south of the area of my sighting. to my knowledge the airfield services small and medium commercial aircraft. the guard operates kc-135 tankers. the object had flashing lights on it, similar to an aircraft. indeed i first thought it was an airplane. but there were also a row of lights in a v formation that seemed to strobe or flash in a distinct pattern. i observed this object for about 5 min until i lost sight of it as we traveled further north.
content.summary: Observed unknown object at low altitude/low speed

content.detailedDescription:
While surfing in rincon, p.R.- around 6.00 a.M., three disk shaped objects
 entered the water about 1 mile from where we were waiting to catch waves.
we did not make much of it since we were close to ramey afb. this happened
on two ocassions as i recall it. as the years passed by,i realized that we do not have that technology- i forgott to mention that this objects came out of the water at an incredible rate of speed after some 30 min.
under water. this event was witnessed by 10 to 12 surfers that were there
at 600. am. i remember telling my father, at that time he was a college
professor and he advised me not to talk about it because it might be a
secret weapon against the communists-cubans! now i am 54 yrs. old, and that was no military weapon! what it was, only god knows!
content.summary: Ufo coming in and out of ocean

content.detailedDescription:
While surfing in rincon, p.R.- around 6.00 a.M., three disk shaped objects
 entered the water about 1 mile from where we were waiting to catch waves.
we did not make much of it since we were close to ramey afb. this happened
on two ocassions as i recall it. as the years passed by,i realized that we do not have that technology- i forgott to mention that this objects came out of the water at an incredible rate of speed after some 30 min.
under water. this event was witnessed by 10 to 12 surfers that were there
at 600. am. i remember telling my father, at that time he was a college
professor and he advised me not to talk about it because it might be a
secret weapon against the communists-cubans! now i am 54 yrs. old, and that was no military weapon! what it was, only god knows!
content.summary: Ufo coming in and out of ocean

content.detailedDescription: Got up to smoke a cig. the people next door were have a party and they were all fussing about somthing in the sky so i when out side and started looking around in the sky and found what they weere looking at it was not from here i live in corrina at the time there were these little probe coimg out from underneath this crafe one headed newport way and the other headed torwards greedvilles way these little probe came and left in the blink of a eye the were gone for about five mins. and simply just show up back under the crafe. just wanted to share with you this is my third sighting of crafes my first one was in fla. in 69 were i saw thee mother ship  it was so close i thoght i could have reach out and touch it but the second one in n.C. in 1980 at a family reuion got up to pee when out side my father bought a house that was a old tobacoo farm so there was a lot of cleared land around there so i was doing my bezzness i heard this very high pitched sound not loud but high pitch so i stared looking around for this sound and found this craft about 100 yards away 100 feet in the sky shaking like a old drunks hands so im watching this thing for about 2/3 mins and i kid you not all of a sudden this craft stared melting kinda like if you were to take a peice of plactic put a match to it at night and it kinda of melts in diff.Colors this is just what this thing did it was the most beutaful ara of color that i have ever saw this felling came over me like i was in the middle of the making of a rainbow i never seen such bright color in my life, anyways all these color kinda flowed like a river of color towards the ground and as they got close to the ground they just disaperd i mean nothing hit the ground and it just stoped, now im kinda hiding behind this tree thinking shit what the hell was that and i no longer ggot that thought out of my mind and a in the exact place the other craft was another one just show up there no light nothing it was just there, shot this beem of light down there it went dark and about 1 min. later asecond craft show up there light came on and it vanished in the blink of a eye. crazy stuff. do i belive you bet.Scott.
content.summary: Three sighting just had to share

content.detailedDescription: I saw a glowing object in the sky, the object flew from south to north. i could not tell what altitude it was at but it appeared to travel the entire sky in about 6 seconds. it was faintly lit and did not look like a falling star or an airplane. it seemed to slow for a falling star and to fast for an airplane. it seemed to be a light orange redish color. strange indeed.
content.summary: Traveling glowing  across entire sky from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i was driving on our way to church we were leaving our home in chula vista. i had just gotten off of the 805 north and connected unto the
94 west when all of a sudden my daughter said mommy what are those lights up in the sky. i looked toward the sky there to my surprise was 4 very bright circular lights these lights did not blink i said maybe they are airplanes my daughter said no the lights are to close together to be airplanes. she kept starring at the lights while i would take quick glances because i was driving. my daugher said mommy i think it is a ufo the lights must have been shining bright for a good minute when suddenly the lights went off came back on quickly and then there was only 3 shining lights with in 10-20 secs later all of the light had dissapeared into the sky.  when we finally reached the church one of the members was just getting out of her car and witnessed the same thing. i was glad of that because i did not want us to be the only one to have witnessed the unknown lights in the sky. every since i saw those lights i can get it out of mind because i know it was not a helicopter, airplane or blimp.
the lights did not blink and they were stationary and very bright.
content.summary: Unknown bright lights appearing in the western part of the sky

content.detailedDescription:
After living next door for 5 years i decided to get a bigger apartment, as where i live now for 19 years.  when i first moved in here i was putting things away.  when i sat in a chair in my living room i looked out of my window.  from outer space an object stopped about 150 yards from my upstaires apartment.  it looked like a ball with a stick coming from the center of the ball.  the object made very fast pendulum movments, as the stick part was up.  the ball had violet, orange, pink and blue colors where the stick had more colors.  the ball and the stick spun very quickly in opposite directions.  in 3 seconds the object flung out, and disappeared into outer space.  the ball part was about 5 feet in diameter, and the stick part was about 6 feet long and 2 inches thick.  

i saw this object when i was hot and tired from working in my apartment.  i by no means think this was the cause of the sighting, to say i was seeing things.  thank you.
content.summary: A very unusual aircraft outside of my window.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from the library when i looked up, and saw an apparent severe meteor shower, as the sky was all streaked.  i occasionally would look up at it when one time i did i saw a sphere high in the sky come down to the ground.  it was about the size of a basketball, as it suddenly stopped and hovered a foot from the ground in a field across the street from me.  it hovered for about 3 seconds then in one sweeping fast motion flew straight up, and out into space at a high speed.

i do not know if there was any connection with the meteor shower and the sphere.  thank you.
content.summary: A sighted sphere during an apparent meteor shower.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were down in point loma at the old ntc base at about 6:45pm february 27, 2008 looking south west  when we saw 3 disc like glowing objects with a yellowish glow. they were floating in position, no noise, for about a minute. then the one on the far right just disappeared, almost like it evaporated. then within seconds the other two did the same thing. this was witnessed by about 10 people.
content.summary: 3 yellow floating orbs...

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from new port beach.  as i was on new port blvd. i was approaching the new port freeway.  there was a lot of traffic, as a 40 foot cigar shaped object was crossing the freeway.  it was about 50 feet high, and it was completely covered with molten lava.  it had no windows or doors.  it traveled at about 7 mph.  trees to my left ended-up blocking my view of it, so i sped up, but could not see it anymore.  when i got home i put on the radio.  no sooner i turned it on i heard a disc jockey say, "ufo raid in orange county." then a group of people were being interviewed for seeing a round hovering object near the beach.  they said the object finally took off at a high speed.  thank you.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object crosses freeway.

content.detailedDescription: I was playing my video game when i looked out my window
content.summary: It looked liked venus but wasnt

content.detailedDescription:
At the time i was going to tomy's restaurant photographing strange objects in the area (mostly orbs).  i was outside of tomy's restaurant smoking a cigarette.  i stepped forward a couple of steps, and looked up.  to my right i saw a 1 foot in diameter lighted object.  it was 35 feet high, and was traveling towards the main street (chapman ave.)at about 3 mph.  it was very bright, and i could see it was packed will electrical equipment (components, chips etc.).  when it got over the middle of chapman ave. it disappeared completely into another dimension.  

i was amazed by this, and i was prompted to think that the object was some kind of extraterrestrial experiment.  thank you.
content.summary: A very close lighted object

content.detailedDescription: It was night, and i was visiting with my friends who worked there.  when they were closing i was on my way home walking.  when i got to a fence opening near an apartment complex i looked up behind me.  i saw a small dot of light way up in the sky.  i turned around, and watched it.  it came down pretty fast, as it turned out to be somekind of aircraft resembling an airplane.  it's back wings and body looked like an airplane, but its large side wings were angled back with five or six semi-circles on the backs of them.  this aircraft came down fast, and did a nose-dive in the middle of the main street (chapman ave.).  it did not create a sonic boom.  it went straight up at a slight angle, and disappeared into outer space at a high speed.  thank you.
content.summary: A dot of light came down and did a nose dive being somekind of aircraft.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out from the grocery store i was admiring the awsome sun setting sky, still bright daylight with pink cloud formations, i noticed a commercial airliner crossing east to west with the setting sun making it glow, i then observed off to the far left of the sky an object that was much more dull in appearance, no strobing or colored lights flying in a flat trajectory from the north to the south it was about the same size as the airliner i had observed earlier but it had no visable wings or such and appeared to be jusy a cylinder, as it got closer i noticed two large round spot light type lights on its right side, the side facing me, it looked much larger as it was now quite close, it then went into a cloud and did not emerge, what bothered me was its very close proximity to normal aircraft flying by, the cloud formation the object went into had a very unusual shape, the best way i can describe it is, it was like a giant football, with an eye in the center almost like a tornado cloud,
photo attached, althought the object was fully visable i could not identify it and so it remains unidentified, i posted it on here in case any one else had seen it as well, this is the third time i have noticed such an object in the same area, next time i will have my camera with me.
content.summary: Observed what appeared to be a large chrome cylinder with two bright lights on its right side, no strobes

content.detailedDescription: My lady friend and i were walking home from somewhere.  when we were close to her apartment by the preschool i felt like somebody was watching me.  so i looked up, and i saw right above my head about 20 yards high a round 6 foot in diameter object.  as soon as i saw it it disappeared into space at a high speed.  it was very beautiful having colors of orange, pink, blue and violet.  later i found out my lady friend saw it long before i did, but did not say anything.  thank you.
content.summary: An unusual object hovering over my lady friend and i.

content.detailedDescription: In 1997 i saw a comet object from my living room window.  it suddenly turned out into space, and disappeared.  it was about 600 yards away.  three days later i was walking near a close by field, and i saw it in the north taking up a large part of the sky.  it went along at about 35 mph for 7 seconds then it turned straight upward disappearing into space.  its vapourish tail completely followed it into space, leaving no trace.  i saw this object two other times, and once just a month ago outside my living room window where in that same hour i saw two other types of ufos.  one was an airplane looking thing, which was 50 yards from my apartment, and made no noise.  it had a very big tail wing.  and it was orange and black.  i saw it for 8 seconds.  and i saw a small dot of white light that would flare out very bright then dim then bright.  it traveled at about 10 mph going eastward.  thank you.
content.summary: Comet objects returning in my area.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my front porch smoking a ciggarette.  i looked west and saw a plane-like vehicle.  the lights were similar to a plane but it was flying almost straight down and then it made a sharp turn.  it was east from where i was but it was to far to see exactly what it was.  i was terrified in a way because i believed it was going to crash.  like i claim i really believe it was a plane it still boggles me.  it may have been a malfunction.  i lost sight of the object when it flew behind view of the trees.
content.summary: I think it was a plane but the unusual thing about it was that it was flying almost straight down and then made a sharp turn

content.detailedDescription: After retiring for the night and going to bed i rolled over after 5 seconds and i saw outside my upstaires apartment bedroom window a very beautiful object.  it was traveling at 1 mph towards the preschool right over my carports about 15 feet away.  it looked like an outline of a concoction of boxes.  there were small christmas tree type lights in every corner blinking randomly.  the center of it had clear stained glass with a cross in the center.  the center showed that there was light inside.  because it was dark in my apartment, and outside i could only see the outline of it.  i mean i could not tell how thick it was.  it really was very beautiful.  i somehow got the feeling that the object was on auto-pilot, and that there were two or three beings arguing inside.  i viewed the object on my elbow in my bed.  thank you.
content.summary: I rolled over in my bed, and i saw a very beautiful object outside.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving northbound on the i-805 in the national city area. it caught my attention to see about 5 bright lights in the sky on the west side. the lights where far away and would move together very close and then disappear one by one and again reappear in a different area within 3 seconds. i wondered if it could be a plane show. but i have never seen a plane move such a long distance in just 3 seconds. when they reappeared again they turned off one by one then re appeared again in a different location. they kept getting lower and lower. then i could no longer see them.  this all happend in about a minute. i was driving and found myself almost getting in an accident from being so distracted from the lights in the sky. i kept looking in the sky to find the lights to see if they would come back, but nothing. i thought i had just experienced a ufo sighting. but somehow i thought it had to be some kind of a light show. it was very strange to see that, i have never seen anything like it before. later that night i watched the news and they where talking about ufo sightings and they showed a clip of one that looked exactly the same as what i had seen earlier that night. i thought that finally i was going to have an answer. but the clip was from a different date not from that same day. i was waiting for the report on the strange lights in the sky and figured someone else out there had to of seen this and reported it. it was never mentioned on the news. i know someone else had to of seen this out there. i dont know how long it was actually going on but i caught about a minute of it. it was kind of exciting to think that i could of seen ufo's.
content.summary: 5  bright lights in the sky very close together

content.detailedDescription: Did anyone else see this?? my sister and i both witnessed it above mission bay in san diego. there where 3 to 4 short cone shaped ufos. it was 6:30 pm dark out, they gave off a yellow light. they where arranged in a perfect diagonal line fading to black one at a time and then relighting again. never seen anything like it in the sky before!! i was in front of my apartment complex that overlooks the bay. i just noticed it out of the corner of my eye, there where traffic helicopters and airplanes in the sky as well. when i first noticed it i said "what is that?" to my sister, she then saw it too and could not explain what it was. we where both left in awe.
content.summary: 3-4 short cone shaped yellow lighted ufos aranged in a perfect diagnol line fadeing one at a time and then relighting again.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on a summer night in the late 1970s (not sure of the date anymore) on orchard lake road, and had just approached the overpass for highway 696 (east-west highway).  i spotted a triangular aircraft just above the treeline of the residential neighborhood just south of 696, across from the farmington hills campus of oakland community college.  it was dark but the night sky has an incandescence to it in this semi-urban area, so i immediately noticed the craft as it moved back and forth, as if scanning.  i stopped my car on the overpass and opened my window.  two other cars did the same, and i and one other driver got out of our cars to watch and comment.  the aircraft was zipping back and forth over the semi-wooded area, east-to-west, changing direction instantly, without banking.  it was very low, very fast and completely silent, without any lights.  i was stunned by its speed, instant changes in direction and silence.  i thought perhaps it was a test run of some new hight-tech military aircraft, or even some sort of weapon, from selfridge.  i returned to my car and continued to head south on orchard lake road and home, sneaking glances at it as i passed the area.  after about 7 or 8 minutes i reached grand river avenue.  i stopped for the light and looked around, passenger window still down.  i glanced up and saw a huge triangular craft hovering just over the roof of the gas station and pumps at the corner, to my left.  the craft was large, the length of at lest two vehicles, absolutely silent and absolutely still, as if suspended in the air.  it had a light at each corner - one red, one green and one white, non-blinking.  i looked out my window and realized i was also under it.  it was so close i could see intricate details in what appeared to be a metallic surface, as if to accomodate for wiring or piping within the base of the craft.  the light changed and i had to drive off, in shock, wondering what i'd seen that night.  i've never had an experience like that before or since.  nor have i ever forgotten it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Black metallic triangle with red, white and green lights

content.detailedDescription: Last night i was outside in my yard when i looked up to the sky and noticed 3 white circle object forming a triangle and then a row. i don't know what the white circles where but i'm sure it was not a airplane or helicopter. as i was looking at the objects moving around i received a call from my husband who was looking at them too! i couldn't believe what i was looking at. as we were on the phone two of them dissapeared and before i could get my phone ready to video record it the 3rd object dissapeared too!
content.summary: White circles in sky that disappeared and would appear back

content.detailedDescription: i assumed it was a low flying helicopter scanning the beach with a large spotlight because that is how it appeared to me. i stopped to watch it as it approached slowly from a distance of around a mile away. it wasn't until afterward that i realized that there was no sound as it came upon me. as it flew directly over me at a distance of around 80-100 feet, the light appeared to move up in the direction it was traveling and suddenly faded out with a afterglow of luminescence, like a large spotlight turning off. after that, it completely vanished, and there was absolutly nothing there, right before my eyes.
content.summary: While walking on the beach late at night on the pacific coast, i noticed a bright light coming in my direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work one evening on highway 8, it was still light out but dusk. i was about four exits from fletcher parkway exit i needed to take off. i saw a spaceship looking thing in front of me on the right hand side of the highway. i couldnt believe i was seeing this lighted think that looked just like you see in the movies. i questioned myself and looked at the cars next to me all around to see other peoples reactions to see if anyone else was seeing what i was....Yet turning back to see ...Yep ..It was still there. didnt see that anyone else was seeing next to me anyhow. i watched it hover in the same spot without moving...Then when i came to my exit it was right there over the bridge, same spot the whole time i was watching it. still in shock i looked around again to see if anyone else was looking to see if they were looking and saw what i was seeing as i took my exit. no one was responding in shock like i was but evidently not. when i turned my head back...It was gone! i couldnt believe i saw a ufo! as soon as i got home i had to tell people ..And of course they thought i was losing it...But i know what i saw! never really went further to tell many as i knew they wouldnt believe me ...But i know what i saw. wish they had cell phones then i would have had no problem taking a picture of it. 
thanks wanted to share ...Cause it was sooooooooooo true...And unbelievably shocking...Will never forget it. a statement in my head and vision forever...Ya know.  feels good to finally tell someone that knows its the truth!!!! thank you
content.summary: On my way home from work on hwy8, it was hovering over the fletcher pkwy exit one evening

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching tv my kids and their friends came inside to tell us something was falling in the sky.  from first glimpse it appeared to look like and airplanes trail but we kept watching it and it was not moving forward nor up but straight down, a puff of smoke appeared as if it blew up and below that puff of smoke it appeared to still be falling until it just desintegrated.  the neighbors did get this recorded but not the puff just the first part of the falling trail.  i ran inside to call fox 4 news to see if it was the satellite being shot down and they told me that had been post poned a few hours and nothing came across the wire that the satellite was show down yet. i didn't take this anyfurther but it is bothering me.  have there been any reports of this incident or has anyone else possibly claimed to have seen this?
content.summary: A ball of smoke falling from the sky then it looked like it exploded then started falling again

content.detailedDescription:
We were hazing some pledges for our fraternity, the silver keys of tarleton state university, on the bosque river near iredell.  we had the pledges in the water and a bonfire on the bank.  there was some drinking going on, but the members were not drunk.  

at one point during the hazing, a large object, probably oval shaped but dark, came slowly up the river towards us.  it began flashing all different colors of lights all over it, but not in any pattern i can recall.  it stopped about 30 feet above us.  there was absolutely no wind or noise or any other disturbance coming from the thing.  all of us stood in silence looking up at it for at least a full minute. ii thought we were mesmerized and it was almost as if there was some amount of lost time or something.  then it suddenly shot off at an angle upward and disappeared.  we seemed to stand silent for another minute, then broke out in screams and yells.  the strangest thing about it seems to have been forgetting about it for a couple of days immediately after that night.  it wasn't that we actually forgot about it, but our minds didn't register that it happened i guess.  it is hard to explain.  then one day we were sitting around talking about the pledging of that night when someone said something about the ufo.  we all burst out in excitement talking about it and what it could have been, like our memories had come back.  we concluded that it was some sort of military secret weapon or government experiment.  many years later i read something about how so-called abductees recall their experiences.  i hope nothing like that happened, and i don't think it did, but something was going on.

as far as i know, none of the 20-25 of us who witnessed the event have ever come forward.  it has been over 25 years now.  i spoke with two of the witnesses that i managed to find.   both are successful business owners in the dfw metroplex and will not go on record.  both remember almost exactly what i do.  they said people will call them crazy or drunk, so they won't come forward.  one said he would go on record anonymously maybe.  i don't know where all the others are these days.

i am a city councilman now and running for mayor.  the recent event in stephenville here has prompted me to come forward.  most of the people who witnessed our event in 1982 are now reputable folks not given to flights of fancy, as are many of the recent event witnesses.

please let me know if i can do anything else.  i would be willing to undergo controlled hypnosis, assuming that it would work on me.  if there are any silver keys out there who were at the water rally of 1982, please step up and talk.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: About 30 feet long and 20 feet wide
